desc.p: This method creates a list for adding geocaches to. Only the list is created, no geocaches are added to it during the create. For adding and removing geocaches to/from the list use specific methods within the ::services/lists namespace

req.name: list_name
req.p: A string, defining the human readable name of the list

opt.name: list_description
opt.p: A string via which a description of the list's purpose and potentially content can be defined.

opt.name: list_status
opt.p:
This parameter can take the following values:
0 - The list is private
2 - The list is public
3 - The list is public and is visible in cache listings

opt.name: list_password
opt.p: This parameter allows to add a password to a private list. The password has no meaning if the list is public. The first 16 alphanumeric characters are used as a password. No encryption is performed in the password, instead it is stored in the database in plain text.

opt.name: list_watch
opt.p: A boolean, either 0, 1, false, true. If set to 1 or true a user wants to get a notification if the content of the list changes.

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: list_id - The id of the list by which it can be referenced
